VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v_penghapusan_bi` AS select `aa`.`id` AS `id`,`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` AS `id_bukuinduk`,`aa`.`a1` AS `a1`,`aa`.`a` AS `a`,`aa`.`b` AS `b`,`aa`.`c1` AS `c1`,`aa`.`c` AS `c`,`aa`.`d` AS `d`,`aa`.`e` AS `e`,`aa`.`f` AS `f`,`aa`.`g` AS `g`,`aa`.`h` AS `h`,`aa`.`i` AS `i`,`aa`.`j` AS `j`,`aa`.`noreg` AS `noreg`,`aa`.`thn_perolehan` AS `thn_perolehan`,`aa`.`tgl_penghapusan` AS `tgl_penghapusan`,`aa`.`nosk` AS `nosk`,`aa`.`tglsk` AS `tglsk`,`aa`.`uraian` AS `uraian`,`aa`.`gambar` AS `gambar`,`aa`.`ket` AS `ket_hapus`,`aa`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`aa`.`mutasi` AS `mutasi`,`aa`.`sudahmutasi` AS `sudahmutasi`,`aa`.`apraisal` AS `apraisal`,`bb`.`jml_barang` AS `jml_barang`,`bb`.`jml_harga` AS `jml_harga`,`bb`.`id` AS `idbi`,`aa`.`kondisi_akhir` AS `kondisi_akhir`,`aa`.`ket` AS `ket`,`bb`.`kondisi` AS `kondisi`,`bb`.`status_barang` AS `status_barang`,`bb`.`asal_usul` AS `asal_usul`,`bb`.`satuan` AS `satuan`,`bb`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`bb`.`tgl_sensus` AS `tgl_sensus`,`bb`.`idawal` AS `idbi_awal`,`aa`.`e1` AS `e1`,if((((`aa`.`f` = '02') or (`aa`.`f` = '03')) and (`bb`.`kondisi` = 3)),0,if((`bb`.`kondisi` <= 3),1,2)) AS `aset_tetap`,`bb`.`staset` AS `staset`,`bb`.`verifikasi` AS `verifikasi`,`aa`.`nilai_buku` AS `nilai_buku`,`aa`.`nilai_susut` AS `nilai_susut`,`aa`.`idbi_doublecatat` AS `idbi_doublecatat`,`aa`.`idbi_penggabungan` AS `idbi_penggabungan`,`aa`.`hapus_dari` AS `hapus_dari` from (`penghapusan` `aa` join `buku_induk` `bb` on((`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` = `bb`.`id`)))
